author: Alex Hern
title: The Great British meme off - Tech Weekly presents Updog podcast | Technology
text:
The Great British meme off - Tech Weekly presents Updog podcast In the wake of the big cultural event that was Bake Off we celebrate the human meme that is Nadiya Hussein Subscribe via iTunes Download MP3 Podcast feed URL Presented by Elena Cresci with Alex Hern and produced by Alannah Chance 
Friday 9 October 2015 15.59 BST Last modified on Friday 9 October 2015 16.02 BST 
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email Share on Pinterest Share on LinkedIn Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp 
The Bake Off final is the biggest TV event of the year. And these days, it's also the biggest thing on the internet in the UK. So on this week's episode of Updog, the Guardian's podcast celebrating all things internet-y, Elena Cresci wanted to celebrate the memes of Bake Off, and pay tribute to its winner, one-woman-emoji-keyboard Nadiya Hussein. But first, she had to convince Alex Hern that this baking show is worth all the fuss…
• I can and I will: the best acceptance speeches ever 
• Sweet victory for people's favourite Nadiya Hussain 
• The genius of The Great British Bake Off - long read podcast
